titleStmt.title: A confutation of the Solemn League and Covenant, against the persecuting dividing sense put upon it by such who seeke more themselves and their ends, then the glory of God, or the peace of the kingdomes. / By R.L. A true friend to all reall covenanters.
titleStmt.author: R. L.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
